name: FarmersLungTestsForAspergillusFumigatusSaccharopolysporaRectivirgulaOrThermoactinomycesVulgarisAntibody
title: Farmers Lung (Tests for Aspergillus fumigatus, Saccharopolyspora rectivirgula, or Thermoactinomyces vulgaris Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Aspergillus fumigatus, Saccharopolyspora rectivirgula, or Thermoactinomyces vulgaris Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Aspergillus fumigatus, Saccharopolyspora rectivirgula, or Thermoactinomyces vulgaris Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
